docs.title: DevDocs
docs.text:
Welcome to my try to provide distilled development documentation and make it easily accessible via this page 😉.

To navigate around, use the search feature or browse the tabs on top of the page. Current "hot topics" are the first tabs, marked with the 🔥 icon 😁.

docs.title: Writing
docs.text:
Some help when writing:

  • MkDocs - Writing your docs
  • GitHub - Basic Writing and Formatting Syntax
  • GitHub - Organizing Information with Tables
  • GitHub - Creating and Highlighting Code Blocks
  • Material for MkDocs - Getting Started
  • Material for MkDocs - Reference
